javascript.description: Slideshow plugin to replace Flash version provided by Smugmug. Included is a private JavaScript object providing access to the Smugmug API. Check out the code.
javascript.title: jQuery Smugmug slideshow plugin

javascript.description: Accessibility enhancement providing a notification to offer the user a chance to extend their session while not leaving the page. Visit the project, hosted on Google Code or just try a demo.
javascript.title: JavaScript Session Extender

javascript.description: Templating engine for JSON objects and markup, free of programming logic or variables, with very little syntax or extra cruft. Visit the project, hosted on Google Code or just try a demo.
javascript.title: Iris/Lotus Templates

other.description: PHP based View/Controller framework, similar to MVC, for projects with no need of a Model layer.
other.title: Self Control View Framework
